issue.message: Call requires API level 19 (current min is 14): `java.lang.AssertionError()`
issue.errorLine1: throw AssertionError("Block hit bad state $n times", e)

issue.message: This call references a method added in API level 17; however, the containing class null is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.
